QuestData.Title: Blood in the Chapel
QuestData.Description:
$GSir:Madam;, you have helped me before and I beseech you to do so again.
My guards are clearly outnumbered by these brigands. I must stay here to protect Lucille, so I will need you to assist in protecting the guests.
Are you able?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa Red Hand Assassins in Whitegrove Chapel.
QuestData.RewardText:
Well done! My guards seem to have gained the upper hand, thanks to you.
But wait... where is Meredith?
